law.catch_line: Two members of a board are a quorum to do business....

text.section: Two members of a board are a quorum to do business.

section.section: The board shall issue an order that sets forth its determination of any matter brought before it. Two members of a board shall sign the order.
The order shall be filed with the clerk of the board.

text.section:
Each member of a board is entitled to:
compensation at an hourly rate as provided in the State budget; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
With the approval of the Administrator, each board may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
